law.catch_line: The Commission shall meet in the State at the times determined by:...

text.section:
The Commission shall meet in the State at the times determined by:
a majority of the authorized membership of the Commission;
the chairperson of the Commission; or
the Secretary.
A majority of the authorized membership of the Commission is a quorum.

A member of the Commission:
may not receive compensation for service on the Commission; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

The Commission shall:
maintain minutes of its meetings and any other records that it considers necessary; and
provide information, on request, regarding the budget, activities, and programs of the Commission.
